data.lyric:
[ti:Undivided]
[ar:Tim Mcgraw/Tyler Hubbard]
[al:Undivided]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.05]Undivided - Tim Mcgraw/Tyler Hubbard
[00:02.16]Lyrics by：Tyler Hubbard/Chris Loocke
[00:03.53]Composed by：Tyler Hubbard/Chris Loocke
[00:06.84]Tim McGraw：
[00:10.90]You see Billy got picked on at school
[00:14.23]For things he couldn't change
[00:16.72]He tried his best to play it cool
[00:19.24]But in the seventh grade
[00:21.59]You either fit right in or you don't fit
[00:24.53]That's just the cold hard truth
[00:27.24]I wish that I'd have been the friend
[00:29.96]That Billy never knew
[00:31.51]Tim McGraw/Tyler Hubbard：
[00:32.05]I think it's time to come together
[00:34.90]You and I can make a change
[00:37.67]Maybe we can make a difference
[00:40.17]Make the world a better place
[00:42.82]Look around and love somebody
[00:45.42]We've been hateful long enough
[00:48.12]Let the Good Lord reunite us
[00:50.74]'Til this country that we love's
[00:53.72]Undivided
[00:55.34]Yeah
[00:55.55]Tim McGraw/Tyler Hubbard：
[00:56.07]You either go to church or you gonna go to Hell
[00:58.88]Get a job and work or you gonna go to jail
[01:01.53]I just kinda wish we didn't think like that
[01:04.11]Why's it gotta be all white or all black
[01:07.50]And when we gon' learn to try on someone's shoes sometimes
[01:12.05]That's right
[01:12.76]When we gon' start to see from someone else's eyes
[01:16.59]Tim McGraw/Tyler Hubbard：
[01:17.24]I think it's time to come together
[01:20.08]You and I can make a change
[01:22.86]Maybe we can make a difference
[01:25.48]Make the world a better place
[01:28.16]Look around and love somebody
[01:30.77]We've been hateful long enough
[01:33.45]Let the Good Lord reunite us
[01:36.10]'Til this country that we love's
[01:39.08]Undivided
[01:41.72]Oh yeah ayy
[01:44.06]Undivided oh yeah
[01:48.79]Tyler Hubbard/Tim McGraw：
[01:49.86]We're all the same to God
[01:52.06]No matter what we get His love
[01:55.27]I'm tired of lookin' left or right
[01:57.82]So I'm just lookin' up
[01:59.79]Tyler Hubbard/Tim McGraw：
[02:00.37]I think it's time to come together
[02:02.76]You and I can make a change
[02:05.72]Maybe we can make a difference
[02:08.14]Make the world a better place
[02:10.85]Look around and love somebody
[02:13.43]We've been hateful long enough
[02:15.58]Hateful long enough
[02:16.40]Let the Good Lord reunite us
[02:18.74]'Til this country that we love's
[02:21.52]Undivided
[02:23.47]Come on
[02:24.09]Oh yeah ayy
[02:26.79]Undivided oh yeah
[02:31.28]Tim McGraw/Tyler Hubbard：
[02:32.24]You either go to church or you gonna go to Hell
[02:34.66]Oh yeah
[02:35.24]Get a job and work or you gonna go to jail
[02:37.31]Undivided
[02:37.61]I just kinda wish we didn't think like that
[02:40.04]Yep
[02:40.33]Why's it gotta be all white or all black
data.trans:
[ti:Undivided]
[ar:Tim Mcgraw/Tyler Hubbard]
[al:Undivided]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.05]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.16]//
[00:03.53]//
[00:06.84]//
[00:10.90]你瞧 Billy在学校遭人欺负
[00:14.23]因为那些他无法改变的事情
[00:16.72]他竭尽全力保持镇定
[00:19.24]但是进入七年级
[00:21.59]你要么努力融入 你要么格格不入
[00:24.53]事实就是这么残酷无情
[00:27.24]我希望我成为Billy素未谋面的朋友
[00:29.96]默默地关心他
[00:31.51]//
[00:32.05]我想是时候携手并进
[00:34.90]你与我可以做出改变
[00:37.67]也许我们可以改变现状
[00:40.17]让世界变得更美好
[00:42.82]环顾四周 相亲相爱
[00:45.42]我们已经互相憎恨地够久了
[00:48.12]上帝让我们重新凝聚在一起
[00:50.74]直到我们深爱的这个国家
[00:53.72]团结一致 不可分割
[00:55.34]//
[00:55.55]//
[00:56.07]你要么去教堂祈祷 你要么堕入地狱
[00:58.88]找一份工作 奋力拼搏 否则你会沦为阶下囚
[01:01.53]我只希望我们不要想得这么绝对
[01:04.11]为什么这世界一定要非黑即白
[01:07.50]我们什么时候才能学会相互谅解
[01:12.05]就是这样
[01:12.76]我们什么时候才能学会从别人的视角看待问题
[01:16.59]//
[01:17.24]我想是时候携手并进
[01:20.08]你与我可以做出改变
[01:22.86]也许我们可以改变现状
[01:25.48]让世界变得更美好
[01:28.16]环顾四周 相亲相爱
[01:30.77]我们已经互相憎恨地够久了
[01:33.45]上帝让我们重新凝聚在一起
[01:36.10]直到我们深爱的这个国家
[01:39.08]团结一致 不可分割
[01:41.72]//
[01:44.06]团结一致 不可分割
[01:48.79]//
[01:49.86]对上帝来说 众生平等
[01:52.06]无论怎样 我们都得到祂的爱
[01:55.27]我厌倦了左顾右盼
[01:57.82]所以我仰望天空
[01:59.79]//
[02:00.37]我想是时候携手并进
[02:02.76]你与我可以做出改变
[02:05.72]也许我们可以改变现状
[02:08.14]让世界变得更美好
[02:10.85]环顾四周 相亲相爱
[02:13.43]我们已经互相憎恨地够久了
[02:15.58]互相憎恨地够久了
[02:16.40]上帝让我们重新凝聚在一起
[02:18.74]直到我们深爱的这个国家
[02:21.52]团结一致 不可分割
[02:23.47]来吧
[02:24.09]//
[02:26.79]团结一致 不可分割
[02:31.28]//
[02:32.24]你要么去教堂祈祷 你要么堕入地狱
[02:34.66]//
[02:35.24]找一份工作 奋力拼搏 否则你会沦为阶下囚
[02:37.31]团结一致 不可分割
[02:37.61]我只希望我们不要想得这么绝对
[02:40.04]//
[02:40.33]为什么这世界一定要非黑即白
